If you filter your posts better and share them, the opportunity to reach you will increase.

Missed Connection is an innovative platform designed to revive memories and connections lost in the chaos of modern life. Are you looking for that person you chatted with in a bookstore, met by chance on the street, or ran into while walking with your dog in the park? Missed Connection allows you to find that person again and reestablish your connection using the information of that moment.
1. Create a Connection: When you encounter a user, open your app and enter the information of the moment: location, date, time, and perhaps a short description.
2. Share a Post: Share the link you created as a post in the application.
3. Find the Link: If the other party also wants to contact you, they can search for similar information using the (Find) method and access your post.
What Can You Do with Missed Connection?
• Find people you met by chance again
• Connect with people with common interests
• It\'s a fun way to meet new people and make connections
• Maybe you can create a friendship that lasts for years!
The addresses where you can reach us are below.
Rate us on the Play Store
If you delete the message, the entire chat will be irreversibly deleted.
